solution_line_template: To make {unit_sandwich_count} sandwich, you need {slices_per_sandwich} slices so Ryan needs {unit_sandwich_count}*{slices_per_sandwich}= <<{unit_sandwich_count}*{slices_per_sandwich}={slices_for_one_sandwich}>>{slices_for_one_sandwich} slices to make one sandwich.

Since it takes {slices_per_sandwich} slices to make a sandwich, and Ryan wants {num_sandwiches_to_make} sandwiches to take to the beach he needs {slices_per_sandwich}*{num_sandwiches_to_make}= <<{slices_per_sandwich}*{num_sandwiches_to_make}={total_slices_needed}>>{total_slices_needed} slices.
